entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Resolution
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Resolution Airport 02:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -32.2°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.5°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
